Duncan Keith

Full Name: Duncan Keith

(Duncs, Jigsaw, Duncan Teeth, Bambi)

Position: D •  Shoots: Left

6-1, 193lb (185cm, 87kg)

Born: July 16, 1983 in Winnipeg, Manitoba ca

Draft: Chicago, 2nd round (54th overall), 2002 NHL Entry

Amateur Teams: Kelowna Rockets, Michigan State

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player 2025 (Full List)

Pronunciation: \DUHN-kuhn KEETH\

  • Hall of Fame
  • 3x Cup Winner
  • 2x Norris
  • 3x All Star
  • 2014-15 Smythe
  • NHL 100th Anniv. Team

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Duncan Keith?

Duncan Keith is 41 years old.

When was Duncan Keith born?

Duncan Keith was born on July 16, 1983.

Where was Duncan Keith born?

Duncan Keith was born in Winnipeg, Canada.

How tall is Duncan Keith?

Duncan Keith is 6-1 (185 cm) tall.

How much did Duncan Keith weigh when playing?

Duncan Keith weighed 193 lbs (87 kg) when playing.

Is Duncan Keith in the Hockey Hall of Fame?

Duncan Keith was elected into the Hockey Hall of Fame as a Player in 2025.

How many goals did Duncan Keith have?

Duncan Keith had 106 goals over his career.

How many points did Duncan Keith have?

Duncan Keith had 646 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Duncan Keith won?

Duncan Keith has won 3 Stanley Cups as a player.

When did Duncan Keith retire?

Duncan Keith last played in 2022.
